string-array.name: spinnerActivity
string-array.item: I am Sedentary : No sport or exercise
I am lightly active ( light exercise or sports : 1 or 3 days per week)
I am moderatorely active (moderate exercise or sports : 3 or 5 days per week)
I am very active (hard exercise or sports or physical job : 6 or 7 days per week)
I am super active (very hard exercise or sports and physical job or 2x training)
